PageTitle: display ipv6 nd na anti-attack statistics
FuncDef: The display ipv6 nd na anti-attack statistics command displays statistics about NA messages.
CLIs: display ipv6 nd na anti-attack statistics slot <slot-id>

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

Examples: [~HUAWEI] display ipv6 nd na anti-attack statistics slot 1
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check statistics about NA messages, run the display ipv6 nd na anti-attack statistics command. The command output shows statistics about NA messages sent to the CPU and discarded NA messages.
